title: Lot of 13 different T206 - available for individual sale
author: vintagetoppsguy

posts.post_title: Lot of 13 different T206 - available for individual sale
posts.post_content:
The first eight are all VG/EX and were each graded SGC 50.  I did crack them out, but I saved the flips (will include with purchase).  Here is a link that shows all of them when they were graded.  Again, they are all raw at this point as I have since cracked them out.

[url]http://s185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/T206/[/url]

[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/For%20Sale/T206Lot1.jpg[/IMG]

Ames SC350, Atz Piedmont 350, Doyle Piedmont 350-460, Hahn Piedmont 150, Lattimore Piedmont 350, Maddox SC350, Manning Piedmont 350-460 and Perring SC350




These 5 vary in condition, so I will try to describe them as best as possible.

Burch Polar Bear - was a PSA 4 that I cracked out.  I saved the flip, but I can't seem to find it.  If I happen to find it, I will include it with the purchase.

Snodgrass Piedmont 350-460 - we'll call it GOOD with a horizontal crease at the bottom (about 1/4" up).

Sheckard SC150 - we'll call it GOOD with a corner crease top left corner.  

Pfeister Piedmont 350 - we'll call it VG+.  No creases, only corner wear.  Could be VG/EX on a good day.  Wet sheet transfer.  

Kleinow Piedmont 350 - we'll call it GOOD.  Has a few minor creases.  I can't see the creases, but I can feel them.  None break the paper (no paper loss).  

[IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/For%20Sale/T206Lot2.jpg[/IMG]

I am only selling them as one lot at this point.  If they do not sell as one lot, I will consider selling them individually.  Price is $475 delivered.

I tried to sell these as one lot, but didn't get any bites.  They are now available for individual sale.  

Ames, Atz, Doyle SOLD, Hahn, Lattimore, Maddox, Manning SOLD and Perring are each $42.

Burch $55, Snodgrass SOLD, Sheckard $22, Pfeister $40 and Kleinow $22.  

All prices include delivery.

David,

I'll take Doyle & Snodgrass.  Email on the way.

Here is what I have left:

Ames, Atz, Burch, Hahn, Kleinow, Lattimore, Maddoz, Perring, Pfeister and Schlei.  Will listen to reasonable offers or trades - especially mid grade '50s and '60s Topps.
